name: kjbc
description: Strong's Concordance lookups - Search Greek/Hebrew words and get definitions
author: pwarnock

commands.name: lookup-greek
commands.description: Look up a Greek word in Strong's Concordance

commands.name: lookup-hebrew
commands.description: Look up a Hebrew word in Strong's Concordance

commands.name: strongs
commands.description: Get the definition for a Strong's number (e.g., G26 or H430)
